Summary: Biochemical reaction from lovastatin to 6'-exomethylene lovastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from lovastatin to 6'beta-hydroxylovastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP3A5.
Biochemical reaction from lovastatin to 3"-hydroxy lovastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by CYP3A4.
Transport from lovastatin to lovastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by SLCO1B1.
Transport from lovastatin to lovastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCB1.
